TopicTitle: Whenever a vessel is loaded onto the launchpad, the camera bugs out.

Articles.Content: This issue persisted before the 0.1.1 patch. When a rocket is loaded onto any launch pad, the camera acts weird. Instead of panning around the rocket when you move the mouse side to side, the camera instead tilts left to right depending on the mouse movement. This issue only occurs when loading from the VAB. Reverting to launch always fixes the issue

The camera has defaulted to orbital mode, which is annoying.  Hit V until you are back in flight/auto (6 times, I think).

And I agree that this is annoying.  Would be nice to be able to set a default camera angle.
